name: Mystery Solitaire. Grimm's Tales 4
description:
Dive into the mystical and fairy tale world of the Grimm Brothers' fairy tales. Remove the spell of the evil fairy from the sleeping princess and awaken the kingdom from sleep!

Collect the cards into chains and enjoy the atmosphere of magic and riddles! 200 levels of varying difficulty on which are hidden gold cards. Use the auxiliary tools to collect them.

- Solitaire card game – collect chains of cards!
- Interesting levels that will get your brain working!
- Colorful graphics and theme music
- Use your magic wand in times of need!
- Remove cards faster to increase your combo multiplier and get more coins!
- Special tasks and over 15 colorful trophies!
- Original themed decks and 12 card shirt styles!
- Get rid of cards faster with jokers
- Lots of hours of puzzles.
